name: Real Watermelon Gun: Challenge
description:
Real Watermelon Gun: Challenge Game is the first person shooting game that gives all new features of modern fruit shooting games. This 3D shooting game is also for best gun shooters who love new shooting games.Get ready to target the watermelons with sniper gun and shoot them. This is the real sniper shooting duty which will transform you into an expert fruit shooting. The crazy target and shooting challenge is just now one click away from you.
Features:

- Addicting FPS gameplay
- Real Fruit Shooting at Island Paradise
- Real Splash with 3D animation
- Aim and Smash the Fruits
- Time Attack Mode
- Easy Aim and Smooth Controls
